location: Chengde Road Section 4, Shilin District - 188m from Jiantan MRT Station, near Shilin Night Market
notes: 3BR/2BA unit in managed elevator building with good layout and ventilation. Comes fully furnished with appliances. Near Shilin Night Market which means convenient but potentially noisy. Cannot assess modernity or baby safety (balcony railings, sharp corners) without seeing actual interior photos. Has 2 balconies - would need to verify railing safety for a baby. No pets allowed, 1-year minimum lease.
